author: Chang-Ran Kim, Chang-Ran Kim
title: Coronavirus: Japanese children's home reports eight babies with Covid-19
description: None of the children were showing major symptoms such as fever, but they have been hospitalised
content:
A Japanese care home for infants said on Wednesday it has found eight cases of coronavirus infection among its children.
One staff member tested positive for the virus on 16 April, and tests were subsequently conducted on its 29 children, a spokeswoman at Sa… [+751 chars]
